article_title: Rubio on Trump's Stubby Fingers: 'You Know What They Say About Men With Small Hands...'
article_text:
Rubio should stop acting like that guy we gave unparalleled free coverage to for almost a year. — Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) February 29, 2016

Rubio: Trump repeats himself constantly. But "if he's a robot, he was made in China." — Guy Benson (@guypbenson) February 29, 2016

Rubio: Foreign policy and national defense are "not things you can take a course in at Trump University." — Guy Benson (@guypbenson) February 29, 2016
